alert.note: Alert for Cass; Grant; Huntington; Miami; Wabash; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wabash, Grant, Huntington, northwestern Wells, southeastern Cass and southeastern Miami Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 630 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of North Manchester to 6 miles southwest of Wabash to near Kokomo. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marion, Huntington, Peru, Wabash, Gas City, Grissom Afb, Jonesboro, Sweetser, Andrews, Markle, Walton, Swayzee, Bunker Hill, La Fontaine, Van Buren, Lincoln, Wells, Sims, Galveston and Miami. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 262 and 288. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central and northeastern Indiana.

area.areaDesc: Cass; Grant; Huntington; Miami; Wabash; Wells
